title: dkbit98
author: dkbit98
content: BTCPrague is one of the biggest Bitcoin events in Europe and this year it is happening from June 13 to 15 in capital city of the Czech Republic.I see a lot of interesting speakers this year, Stella Assange the wife of Julian Assange, Martti Malmi, Michael Saylor, Adam Back, and others.I know that Trezor is going to reveal their new device in BTCPrague, that was announced for June 14 on their official website.Another interesting event is hunt for free Satochip cards that are loaded with up to 60k sats, there are 20 Satodime bearer crypto cards in the city and they are yours if you find them.https://x.com/satochip/status/1800838125591101655Good luck hunting Satochip is also giving away free developments card if you visit them at BitcoinPrague.https://btcprague.com/Is anyone from Bitcointalk forum going to be in BTCPrague these days?
